title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may try to lose yourself into someones fantasy world today. Your sentimental mood might prompt you to start a movie or pick up a book and then forget to put it down. Ultimately, youre seeking soulful connections with people who capture your imagination. Although you want to smoothly glide through your day, its a challenge to balance your immediate inner needs with your long-term outer goals as elusive Neptune misaligns with Mars in indecisive Libra. Inspiration seems infinitely more interesting now than perspiration. What consumes your mind controls your life. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
